html.content: Presentation: Is the market really a good teacher?
html.p: Stock-flow consistency links all agents' balance sheets together and guarantees that micro behaviors are correctly aggregated (Godley & Lavoie 2007).

test.label: Households
test.val1: sum ( Households , money , t ) + sum ( Households , equities , t )

test.label: Sector: Industry
test.val1: sum ( Industry , inventories.inProcess.val , t ) + sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.val , t ) + sum ( Industry , machinery.val , t ) + sum ( Industry , cash , t )
test.val2: sum ( Industry , liabilities , t ) + sum ( Industry , capital , t )

test.label: Sector: Banks
test.val2: sum ( Banks , liabilities , t ) + sum ( Banks , capital , t )

test.label: Cross-sectoral: Deposits
test.val1: sum ( Households , money , t ) + sum ( Industry , cash , t )

test.label: Cross-sectoral: Capital
test.val2: sum ( Industry , capital , t ) + sum ( Banks , capital , t )

test.label: Cross-sectoral: Net Worth
test.val2: sum ( Industry , inventories.inProcess.val , t ) + sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.val , t ) + sum ( Industry , machinery.val , t )

tr.td: ΔMh = WB + FDf + FDb - C - CAP

test.label: Money deposits held by households
test.val1: sum ( Households , money , t ) - sum ( Households , money , t-1 )
test.val2: sum ( Households , wages , t ) + sum ( Households , dividends , t ) - sum ( Households , consumption.val , t ) - sum ( Households , sharePurchase , t )

tr.td: ΔE = C + I - S - FDf - FDb - Kdep + CAP

test.label: Equities held by households
test.val1: sum ( Households , equities , t ) - sum ( Households , equities , t-1 )
test.val2: sum ( Industry , grossProfit , t ) - sum ( Industry , dividends , t ) - sum ( Industry , fixedCapital.depreciation , t ) - sum ( Industry , inventories.depreciation , t ) - sum ( Banks , dividends , t ) + sum ( Banks , foreclosures.val , t )

test.label: Stocks and flows: Households Net Worth
test.val1: sum ( Households , netWorth , t ) - sum ( Households , netWorth , t-1 )
test.val2: sum ( Industry , wageBill , t ) + sum ( Industry , investment.val , t ) - sum ( Industry , fixedCapital.depreciation , t ) - sum ( Industry , inventories.depreciation , t ) - sum ( Industry , sales.cost , t )

test.label: Stocks and flows: Work In Progress
test.val1: sum ( Industry , inventories.inProcess.val , t ) - sum ( Industry , inventories.inProcess.val , t-1 )
test.val2: sum ( Industry , wageBill , t ) - sum ( Industry , production.val , t )

test.label: Stocks and flows: Inventories
test.val1: sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.val , t ) - sum ( Industry , inventories.fg.val , t-1 )
test.val2: sum ( Industry , production.val , t ) - sum ( Industry , sales.cost , t ) - sum ( Industry , inventories.depreciation , t )

test.label: Stocks and flows: Fixed Capital
test.val1: sum ( Industry , machinery.val , t ) - sum ( Industry , machinery.val , t-1 )
test.val2: sum ( Industry , investment.val , t ) - sum ( Industry , fixedCapital.depreciation , t )

tr.td: ΔMf = Lnew - Lback + C - WB - INT

test.label: Stocks and flows: Firms Deposits
test.val1: sum ( Industry , cash , t ) - sum ( Industry , cash , t-1 )
test.val2: sum ( Industry , liabilities.new , t ) - sum ( Industry , liabilities.repayment , t ) + sum ( Industry , sales.val , t ) - sum ( Industry , wageBill , t ) - sum ( Industry , investment.val , t ) - sum ( Industry , dividends , t ) - sum ( Industry , interest , t )

test.label: Stocks and flows: Firms Debts
test.val1: sum ( Industry , liabilities , t ) - sum ( Industry , liabilities , t-1 )
test.val2: sum ( Industry , liabilities.new , t ) - sum ( Industry , liabilities.repayment , t ) - sum ( Industry , canceledDebts , t )

tr.td: ΔEf = C + I - S - FDf - Kdep - INT + Lnp

test.label: Stocks and flows: Firms Capital
test.val1: sum ( Industry , capital , t ) - sum ( Industry , capital , t-1 )
test.val2: sum ( Industry , grossProfit , t ) - sum ( Industry , dividends , t ) - sum ( Industry , fixedCapital.depreciation , t ) - sum ( Industry , interest , t ) - sum ( Industry , inventories.depreciation , t ) + sum ( Industry , canceledDebts , t )

test.label: Stocks and flows: Banks Deposits
test.val1: sum ( Banks , liabilities , t ) - sum ( Banks , liabilities , t-1 )
test.val2: sum ( Banks , loans.new , t ) + sum ( Banks , dividends , t ) - sum ( Banks , loans.repayment , t ) - sum ( Banks , interest , t ) - sum ( Banks , foreclosures.val , t )

test.label: Stocks and flows: Banks Loans
test.val1: sum ( Banks , assets , t ) - sum ( Banks , assets , t-1 )
test.val2: sum ( Banks , loans.new , t ) - sum ( Banks , loans.repayment , t ) - sum ( Banks , canceledDebts , t )

test.label: Stocks and flows: Banks Capital
test.val1: sum ( Banks , capital , t ) - sum ( Banks , capital , t-1 )
test.val2: sum ( Banks , interest , t ) - sum ( Banks , dividends , t ) - sum ( Banks , canceledDebts , t ) + sum ( Banks , foreclosures.val , t )

html.p: Accounting identities are checked at the end of each period. If an error occurs, details are printed in the log file.
